{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=3 |revision=(4200X) |upc=829610880365 |asin=B00BGGDVOO,B00PBIJHQY, |price=100 |est_release_date=03/06/2013 |fcc_date=02/08/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |type=media player,media streamer, |fcc_id=TC2-R1004 |ic_id=5959A-R1004 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM11130;BCM11130KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=900 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125:K |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43236B;BCM43236BKMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM5241A1;BCM5241A1KMLG; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI out |802dot11_protocols=abgn }} {{TagLine|Streaming Media Player}} :{{WPLink|Roku}}
*[http://www.engadget.com/2013/02/08/roku-4200x-fcc/ ''Roku 4200X'' on '''EnGadget'''] :[http://gdgt.com/roku/3/specs/ Spec. on '''gdgt''']
===Specifications=== *Per the FCC photos, the device is using... :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM11130KFEBG (BCM11130) @900MHz :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43236BKMLG (BCM43236B) 2T2R :Flash: ''Toshiba'', RAM: 2x ''Micron'';PA: 2x ''SiGe'' SE2577L
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20141020161357/http://blog.streamingmedia.com:80/2013/03/roku-3-teardown-a-look-inside-the-new-box.html Internal shots on ''StreamingMediaBlog''] (archived on IA) :RAM: 2x ''Micron'' MT41K128M16JT-125:K (256MB, D9PTK FBGA) :Switch: BCM5241A1KMLG FE PHY (BCM5241A1) :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.fastcompany.com/3006649/tech-forecast/roku-3-gets-faster-makes-it-easier-find-shows-and-plugs-headphones-remote (Dual-core A9) based]
